page.shortlink: grid component client side aftersearchsaved event
page.description: Fires after the user saves the Search Part criteria.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object passed to the event that contains the following properties:

property.name: hasError
property.description: Indicates whether or not an error occurred while loading the saved search.

property.name: errorText
property.description: Contains additional information about the error, if any occurred.
